author: CmsHI
body:
Adds a tracking iteration to recover displaced tracks into the HI reco sequence (important for b-tagging).
Comes right after the initial step, as is now done in the pp tracking.
The low pT HI step now has a misleading naming convention (second triplet).  We propose to fix that in the next pre-release to keep this PR as simple as possible.
The # of extra tracks produced by this step is relatively modest (< 10% increase), so event size will not change dramatically.
The extra CPU time is also relatively modest compared to the current total tracking time.
title: Add hi detached triplet step
